entries.title: Image missing alt attribute
entries.description: Add alt="description" for informative images or alt="" for decorative

entries.title: SVG may need accessibility attributes
entries.description: Add aria-label for meaningful icons or aria-hidden="true" for decorative

entries.title: Click handler on non-interactive element
entries.description: Use <button> for actions or <a> for navigation, or add role="button" tabIndex={0}

entries.title: Clickable div is not keyboard accessible
entries.description: Use <button> instead, or add role="button" tabIndex={0} onKeyDown handler

entries.title: Clickable span is not keyboard accessible
entries.description: Use <button> instead, or add role="button" tabIndex={0} onKeyDown handler

entries.title: Negative tabIndex removes element from tab order
entries.description: Only use tabIndex={-1} for programmatically focused elements

entries.title: Positive tabIndex disrupts natural tab order
entries.description: Use tabIndex={0} or restructure DOM for natural order

entries.title: autoFocus can disorient screen reader users
entries.description: Use sparingly, only for modals/dialogs where focus management is needed

entries.title: Input without id may lack label association
entries.description: Add id and associate with <label htmlFor="id">

entries.title: Icon-only button may lack accessible name
entries.description: Add aria-label="description" or visually hidden text

entries.title: Placeholder is not a substitute for labels
entries.description: Add visible <label> or aria-label for accessibility

entries.title: Color alone used to convey meaning
entries.description: Add icons, text, or patterns alongside color for colorblind users

entries.title: Anchor tag without href
entries.description: Use <button> for actions or add href for navigation

entries.title: Empty href="#" creates navigation issues
entries.description: Use <button> for actions, or provide meaningful href

entries.title: Required: Interactive element missing data-testid
entries.description: Add data-testid="descriptive-name" for testing

entries.title: Required: Icon button should have aria-label
entries.description: Add aria-label="action description"

entries.title: Required: Button missing explicit type attribute
entries.description: Add type="button" to prevent form submission, or type="submit" for forms

entries.title: Required: Component with variants should use cn() for class merging
entries.description: Use cn() from lib/utils for proper Tailwind class merging

entries.title: Required: Reusable component should support ref forwarding
entries.description: Wrap component with React.forwardRef for ref support

entries.title: Keyboard: All interactive components must be keyboard accessible
entries.description: All interactive components must be keyboard accessible

entries.title: Keyboard: Support Tab, Enter, Space, Arrow keys, Escape
entries.description: Support Tab, Enter, Space, Arrow keys, Escape

entries.title: Keyboard: Provide visible focus indicators
entries.description: Provide visible focus indicators

entries.title: Keyboard: Implement proper focus management in overlays
entries.description: Implement proper focus management in overlays

entries.title: Screen reader: Use semantic HTML elements
entries.description: Use semantic HTML elements

entries.title: Screen reader: Provide ARIA labels for icon-only controls
entries.description: Provide ARIA labels for icon-only controls

entries.title: Screen reader: Announce state changes (loading, errors, success)
entries.description: Announce state changes (loading, errors, success)

entries.title: Screen reader: Use ARIA live regions for dynamic content
entries.description: Use ARIA live regions for dynamic content

entries.title: Color contrast: Meet WCAG AA contrast ratios (4.5:1 text, 3:1 UI)
entries.description: Meet WCAG AA contrast ratios (4.5:1 text, 3:1 UI)

entries.title: Color contrast: Don't rely on color alone for information
entries.description: Don't rely on color alone for information

entries.title: Color contrast: Provide patterns/icons alongside color coding
entries.description: Provide patterns/icons alongside color coding

entries.title: Fitts's Law: minimum touch target size
entries.description: Target size + distance affect interaction time. Application: min-h-11 (44px) for touch targets on mobile
entries.counterExample: Buttons <44px on mobile, Tiny click targets

entries.title: Cognitive Load: reduce unnecessary mental burden
entries.description: Mental effort is finite - reduce unnecessary cognitive burden. Application: Minimize choices, use recognition over recall, maintain context
entries.counterExample: Information overload, Hidden options, Requiring memorization, Dense layouts
